. Established in 1891 the people have preserved their French culture.

To get here from Winnipeg just take Hwy 2 West and take a left at Provincial Road 244 South. If coming from the Pembina Canada-U.S.A. border just stay on Hwy 75 and turn at Hwy 23 West and Take Provincial Road 244 North.

value: content=Located between the Elementary School and the Notre Dame covenent. The grotto was made in 1954 by Sister Thérèse-de-l'Enfant Jésus, Elementary School Principal and Father Dacquay to show thanks for the Virgin Mary for protecting them from the epidimic.
content=A bronze statue made by Réal Bérard. For the founder of Notre-Dame-de-Lourdes. You can find more information about him in the church.
